text.text: Been attending my first and only church since Oct 2007! Filled with friends, family, a great atmosphere! It‚Äôs a perfect community to be in if you want to know more about and grow in the Christian faith. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Been attending my first and only church since Oct 2007! Filled with friends, family, a great atmosphere! It‚Äôs a perfect community to be in if you want to know more about and grow in the Christian faith. Highly recommend!

text.text:
Giving this review impartially and from a neutral perspective (1 stars).

First of all, here are the pointers I would like to feature here, hope this helps to any first timers out there looking for churches.

Reviewing many different churches, I have reviewed based on personal experiences in terms of practices, and how this would perceive by different people.

And here are my pointers (like it or not, it's just a review):

1) The church might be a 'shock' to certain people who aren't used to the idea of a charismatic church as those coming from traditional background would mistaken it as a 'rock concert' due to their conservative background. For these people, I would strongly suggest to reconsider for a different church.

2) If you are for a strong community, then this church is for you, but if you are not comfortable with the idea of heavy shepherding, I would strongly suggest that you can reconsider for a different church with a different practices.

3) For anyone above 60 years old, if you are "young at heart", this is for you. Otherwise, I would strongly caution that you might be startled and taken aback on the ratio of young and older adults within the congregation as it might be "too loud" for some of you.

4) They do have a growing Chinese-speaking congregants (though still small) but at the moment they are ministered by translation ministry whereby every week the message is being translated from English to Mandarin so if your loved one does listen and speaks Mandarin and are young at heart, do invite them over!

5) Their services is only held only on Saturdays (if you wonder why there are no services on Sundays).

6) This church is an offshoot of Church of Singapore Bukit Timah since 2016 (from anyone who is been there long enough).

7) Their kids service, Impact Kids, holds at Vision Exchange on every Saturday.

8) If you have been to megachurches before, their church concept is strikingly similar, which might poses some to feel uncomfortable if you are from a traditional churches.

9) Planetshaker Church Singapore has a similar congregation size as Impact Life Church, despite Planetshaker here is a Singapore campus shoot from Melbourne, Australia.

Over all, I give it a 1 out of 5 stars, as this church is mainly consist of the millennium generation as the majority of the congregation, with the growing number of gen-Z, and a tiny number of congregants who are of gen-X and boomer generations.

Photos were taken last year. To each own opinions as if you prefer youthfulness then this church is for you.

text.text:
Always so proud to call ILC my home!! A wonderful bunch of people and caring pastoral leaders. Never looked back since the day I stepped in to this church in 2012.

ILC strongly believes in communities. My community has taught me what it means to be real and showed me a glimpse of God‚Äôs extravagant love for me. ‚ù§Ô∏è By being vulnerable here, I truly understood what it means to be fully known yet deeply loved.

Highly recommend to visit if you are looking to understand what it means to have a relationship with God. üî• You are welcome here. :)

text.text: Amazing Worship experience and powerful words base preaching, Presence of God is always strongly felt here.

originalText.text: Amazing Worship experience and powerful words base preaching, Presence of God is always strongly felt here.

text.text:
I'm a new commer at this church and my cousin recommend me as my dad tell him to bring me. it is pretty odd but I love it. I will never be bored at home bc staying at home only play, watch iPad or play with my pet rabbit. I'm grateful to be joining there.
-new member xin lei
